title: Add cosAngle Stream Evaluator
description:
This ticket will add a cosAngle Stream Evaluator to calculate the cosine angle between two vectors. 


a = cosAngle(colA, colB)



The implementation is provided by Apache Commons Numbers

comments.content: This will require an upgrade to Apache Commons Math 3.6
comments.author: Joel Bernstein

comments.content: Actually the Apache Commons Numbers project seems to have the preferred implementation.
